longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 6 months from the arrival date. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of temporary passports.

Visa required
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Those not leaving the airport in the countries with risk of
  yellow fever transmission. 
Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P. vivax,
  exists throughout the year in rural areas of the Terai
  districts bordering with India, with occasional outbreaks of
  P. falciparum from July to October inclusive. Seasonal
  transmission of P. vivax takes place in districts of the
  inner Terai and midhills. Recommended prevention in risk
  areas: C.
